pages.title: Legends & Myths
pages.text: There are many crops that have allegedly gone extinct, but I think they can still be found out there.

pages.title: Spicy Berries
pages.text: Spicy Berries, location unknown. Somewhere in the Nether probably.

pages.title: Amaranth
pages.text: Amaranth, a bright purple plant, location unknown. The Old Ones grew it in temples long ago.

pages.title: Rice
pages.text: Rice, location unknown. The Old Ones grew it near temples in ancient villages long ago.

pages.title: Green Beans
pages.text: Green Beans, location unknown. People once grew it in Villages before they found Carrots.

pages.title: Living Mandrake
pages.text: Living Mandrakes, an apparently sentient plant. Location unknown.

pages.title: Puff Balls
pages.text: Puff Balls, a wonderfully soft source of string. Villagers grew it before they learned to tame Sheep and shear them.
